name: KERIBATO!
description:
A simple and exhilarating RPG puzzle game. In a dungeon packed with monsters, the goddess Nike fights while kicking enemies to regain her wings!

■Story
Long ago, the gods of Olympus, led by Zeus, and the Titans, led by Zeus' father Kronos, fought for control of the universe. This battle of the gods was known as the Titanomachia, and it was so large in scale that it nearly destroyed the world.
However, the battle between the immortal gods was inconclusive, and neither side was able to win. Zeus tried to win Nike, the goddess of victory who had the blood of the Titans, to his side, but Cronus, learning of this, tricked Nike into taking away her wings and plunged her into the abyss of Tartarus, the cave of the abyss.
In the cave, crammed with demons, the only person she could rely on was Pupo, an owl.
Will Nike be able to recover her wings from the giants and return to the earth?

■How to play
This is a puzzle RPG with simple rules.
Nike will take damage when fighting enemies with a higher level than her, but can defeat enemies with a lower level by kicking them from behind.
Kicking an enemy will deal damage to the enemy ahead.
Treasure chests appear from time to time, some of which contain useful items and some of which are traps.
There are also powerful enemies that chase Nike. Level up while running away from them and aim to escape from the dungeon.
